title: Udemy Creative Marketing Strategies to Boost Your Business Tutor
description:
Udemy Creative Marketing Strategies to Boost Your Business Tutorial


In order to win, your marketing must be so compelling, if you feel yourself as a Superman without Super Powers, then... All you need is a bit of help to kick your marketing strategy!

Are you ready for our Super Powers to be passed on you?

This course is not a simple one. It is a package of 5 courses:

- Ninja Advertising
- Network Marketing
- Event Marketing
- Linkedin Marketing
- Gamification Marketing

There are also 3 more upcoming courses to be added soon. You can purchase each course separately, but also you can save money for your marketing activities and buy the whole package as one course. This way, any further updates and new courses will be for free for YOU.

So, with this package You'll get creative marketing ideas and inspirational tips. Each mini course is easy to chew, as it's structured in 8-10 video lessons. Totaling around 50+ lectures for the whole lot. One lecture will take around 5-10 minutes. The entire package clocks in around 4 hours. So, why not to learn new skills over the nearest weekend?

Take consumers by surprise, makes an indelible impression, and pop up where and when people least expect it with your creative marketing strategy.

What are the requirements?

- You need to have a Hunger to Learn!
- You need to be familiar with Online Marketing
- You are expected to be Creative!

What am I going to get from this course?

- Over 43 lectures and 3.5 hours of content!
- Learn Ninja Advertising Techniques
- How to Get Traffic with Micro Macro Conversions
- Attract JV Partners and Affiliates
- Market via Events and Networking
- Market Your Events to Gain Maximum Attendance
- Develop the best networking approaches and behaviours
- Talk to the right people, have productive conversations
- Learn How to Promote Your Business via Linkedin
- How to start an Advertising Campaign on Linkedin
- How to Create a Gamification Marketing Strategy
- Learn Elements of Successful Gamification


What is the target audience?

- This course is relevant to anybody who is responsible for developing and implementing marketing strategies.
- Professionals, Entrepreneurs, Start ups, Business owners
